Event.Name: TheDocks01
Event.Title: Ngày 16 tháng 1 năm 2498
Event.DetailText: Thuộc địa Arcadia đã xây dựng DSRA, viết tắt của Deep Space Research Array (Viện Nghiên cứu Không gian Sâu) để nghiên cứu các hiện tượng như lỗ đen và các khu vực ngoài tầm với của tàu thamw dò. Nhưng rồi DSRA đã bị phá hủy vì cuộc xâm lược Arcadia của Covenant vào năm 2531.

Event.Name: Event001
Event.Title: Năm 2506
Event.DetailText: Dự án ORION, nó là dự án nguyên mẫu về SPARTAN - một dự án trong đó cả Chính phủ Quân sự (Colonial Military Administration) cố gắng thành lập một đội siêu chiến binh để thực hiện các hoạt động quân sự bí mật ở Outer Colonies. Mặc dù những Spartan này đạt được một số thành công, nhưng sức mạnh của họ không đáp ứng được kỳ vọng ban đầu, đồng thời chi phí phát triển và thực hiện quá lớn đến mức dự án phải bị hủy bỏ. Những người lính trong dự án này sau đó đã được chuyển đến đội quân đặc biệt khác.

Event.Name: Event002
Event.Title: Ngày 17 tháng 8 năm 2517
Event.DetailText: Tiến sĩ Catherine Halsey và trung úy của cô, Jacob Keyes, bí mật sàng lọc các đối tượng thử nghiệm đầu tiên dành cho dự án "SPARTAN-II". Họ kết luận rằng, trong số các ứng cử viên - một nhóc có tên là "John" - là đối tượng lý tưởng nhất cho dự án. Sau đó Tiến sĩ Halsey quyết định đưa nhóc nhập ngũ một cách bí mật.

Event.Name: Event003
Event.Title: Ngày 23 tháng 9 năm 2517
Event.DetailText: Dự án SPARTAN-II của Tiến sĩ Halsey đã bắt đầu trên hành tinh Reach của hệ sao Epsilon Eridani. 75 chàng trai và cô gái đã trải qua quá trình huấn luyện nghiêm ngặt về thể chất và tinh thần, sau đó họ được đưa vào chương trình tăng cường xương và cơ bắp.

Event.Name: BlackBox04
Event.Title: Ngày 20 tháng 7 năm 2520
Event.DetailText: Alexander, dân quân với chức thuyền trưởng cuối cùng của tàu Spirit of Fire, anh ấy đã nghỉ hưu sau khi hoàn thành nhiệm vụ ở Verent. UNSC sau đó đã trưng dụng con tàu và biến nó thành tàu chiến.

Event.Name: BlackBox05
Event.Title: Ngày 1 tháng 9 năm 2520
Event.DetailText: Lực lượng của tàu Spirit of Fire đã hoàn thành việc tu sửa lớn tại xưởng đóng tàu trên quỹ đạo hành tinh Reach và sẽ bắt đầu sứ mệnh của mình với tư cách là tàu hỗ trợ mặt đất, bắt đầu với Chiến dịch TREBUCHET.

Event.Name: PirthOutskirts01
Event.Title: Sắc lệnh tối cao của Prophet of Restraint
Event.DetailText: Con tàu của Kig-Yar: "Pitiless" đã đưa xác của một người đàn ông ô uế lên con tàu. Hãy nghe đây: Ta phải tìm toàn bộ những con tàu của Kig-Yar. Hãy để Sangheili trung thành dẫn đầu Unggoy và lục soát mọi con tàu của Kig-Yar để tìm thêm bằng chứng về những kẻ ô uế như người đàn ông đó. Hãy thực hiện điều này NGAY BÂY GIỜ.

Event.Name: BlackBox11
Event.Title: Sắc lệnh tối cao của Prophet of Tolerance
Event.DetailText: Hãy nghe đây: Hơn 500 đội được giao nhiệm vụ nghiên cứu ngôn ngữ của những kẻ ô uế. Mỗi đội phải gồm có Unggoy và Sangheili đủ thông minh. Họ sẽ chỉ nói chuyện với nhau bằng ngôn ngữ của những kẻ ô uế. Nếu toàn bộ lực lượng tấn công của chúng ta học được ngôn ngữ của những kẻ ô uế, chúng sẽ rơi vào tình trạng bối rối.

Event.Name: Prophet02
Event.Title: Trích từ Punished Deeds (Quả Báo), Tập III
Event.DetailText: Regret trở thành linh mục cao cấp ở độ tuổi trẻ thông qua việc thao túng dư luận và tống tiền những người xung quanh hắn. Một số Prophet, bao gồm cả Regret, đã gặp được Oracle, một trí tuệ nhân tạo (AI) cổ xưa, nơi mà hắn biết được rằng con người bằng cách nào đó có mối liên hệ với chủng tộc Forerunner và hắn cũng biết được điều gì đó có thể làm lung lay nền tảng đức tin của Covenant. Quyết định tiêu diệt loài người của họ nhằm che giấu những sự thật này vẫn còn gây tranh cãi cho đến ngày nay.

Event.Name: Chasms01
Event.Title: Sắc lệnh tối cao của Prophet of Truth
Event.DetailText: All within the Covenant hear now and obey. Weapons and ships of war to descend upon the inhabited world of Epsilon Indi. Strike with all force. No intelligent survivors may remain, upon severest penalty.

Event.Name: Event004
Event.Title: 3 February 2525
Event.DetailText: Contact with the agricultural colony Harvest is lost. Initial attempts to re-establish contact fail. The worst is feared. Meanwhile, in orbiting ONI facilities near Reach, surgical procedures to augment the SPARTAN-II candidates are about to begin. Many candidates will "wash out" - dead or crippled by the process.

Event.Name: Arbiter01
Event.Title: Excerpt from The Punished Deeds, Vol. III
Event.DetailText: This new Arbiter did not fear death, but even he was afraid of what was inside the relics of the Ancients. Before he entered a relic, he would send in a squad of Unggoy to check for any signs of danger. If all was clear, they would live, but at the slightest sign of trouble the Arbiter would detonate plasma bombs attached to the methane tanks.

Event.Name: Event005
Event.Title: 20 April 2525
Event.DetailText: Contact with the scout ship Argo, sent to investigate the problem on Harvest, is lost. A larger, armed battlegroup is prepared in response.

Event.Name: Arbiter02
Event.Title: Excerpt from The Punished Deeds, Vol. III
Event.DetailText: The new Arbiter was almost immediately tested. An installation of the Ancients near remnants of a massive space installation that was thought to contain a "key," an object that was believed could be used to activate technology. The installation was heavily defended by a growing faction of Elites who did not agree with the ways of the new Prophets. The Arbiter killed them in a battle that raged for days. A key was never found but the dissident movement was silenced.

Event.Name: Event006
Event.Title: 7 October 2525
Event.DetailText: Battle Group D arrives at Harvest and engages the Covenant, but is forced to jump away back to Reach after two of its three ships are destroyed by a single Covenant vessel. An audio-only message was transmitted by the Covenant during this engagement: "Your destruction is the will of the gods... and we are their instrument." It is believed that because the message was transmitted in English, the Covenant have been studying humanity for some time.

Event.Name: FrozenValley01
Event.Title: 1 November 2525
Event.DetailText: The UNSC military goes on full alert and begins making preparations to move in and retake Harvest. All Colonial Military Administration combat forces are immediately placed under NavCom / UniCom "for the duration of the crisis." The SPARTAN-II project is accelerated to its final phase: MJOLNIR, a new form of powered armor specifically designed for Spartan use.

Event.Name: Tundra01
Event.Title: 27 November 2525
Event.DetailText: All SPARTAN-IIs are transported to the Damascus Materials Testing Facility on Chi Ceti-4 to be equipped with MJOLNIR armor. They only have a matter of hours to test suit operation before an alien vessel enters the system and attacks their orbiting support ship. In the ensuing battle, three Spartans board the enemy ship and encounter their first Covenant soldiers, capturing an energy shield gauntlet. One Spartan is lost in the engagement.

Event.Name: Prophet01
Event.Title: Edict of the Office of the High Prophet of Regret
Event.DetailText: Hear now the infamy in Chi Ceti system. Due to lack of faith on the part of the crew of the vessel Unrelenting, a band of Unclean were able to board and slay. A Science Lance is ordered formed to study the captured weapons and armor that mitigation action can be taken in future.

Event.Name: Event007
Event.Title: Battle of Harvest, 2526
Event.DetailText: At the Battle of Harvest, Vice Admiral Preston Cole's war fleet - one of the largest ever mobilized - engages the alien warship responsible for the decimation of the colony, scoring a victory. Only Cole's last-minute tactical inspiration turns the tide of battle. Upon his return to Earth, Cole is promoted to the rank of Admiral.

Event.Name: TerminalMoraine01
Event.Title: Edict of the Office of the High Prophet of Regret
Event.DetailText: Let the Victory of Episilon Indi be celebrated by fasting and prayer. Unggoy and Kig-Yar food rations to be eliminated for the next three work periods. Sangheili and Jiralhanae to spend two rest periods in public prayer. All attend the public monitors at the sounding of five bells to observe the execution of those who failed their duty at the Victory.

Event.Name: Cutter01
Event.Title: 30 January 2528
Event.DetailText: Captain Cutter turns down a command position on board the destroyer class ship The Prophecy. His decision to stay close to his family prompted an ONI psychological examination that determined that while fit to command, his family ties worked against any larger military career.

Event.Name: Brute01
Event.Title: Incident Report 16-196901
Event.DetailText: Security team called to Jiralhanae Chieftan's quarters at third bell, second shift. Team arrived at location to find quarters door torn from its frame and five chunks of unidentified biological matter in hallway (see attached diagram). Upon inspection, biological matter confirmed as parts of two Unggoy from Deck Four Kitchens. Chieftan was calm and responsive; stated that delivery of his midday meal was not to specifications (thorn beast overdone, dipping sauce insufficient). Maintenance crew notified; official reprimand of D4 Kitchen supervisor filed.

Event.Name: Forge01
Event.Title: 17 August 2530
Event.DetailText: Sergeant Forge incarcerated for assaulting a senior officer. His career would have been over if Admiral Cole had not intervened and seen that the investigation was fair and above board. The senior officer eventually faced a court martial and Sergeant Forge was assigned to Spirit of Fire in an effort to keep the prior events quiet.

Event.Name: Anders01
Event.Title: Professor Anders' Log, 30 January 2531
Event.DetailText: Upon boarding The Last Gleaming, I was shown my quarters. On the door it read "Doctor Anders" - the name my mother wanted me to use in my professional career. I cannot abide being reminded of her wishes. This whole cloak-and-dagger trip has her fingerprints all over it.

Event.Name: BlackBox03
Event.Title: From the Office of the High Prophet of Regret
Event.DetailText: Return at fastest possible speed to the world they know as Harvest. We must learn the secrets inside the holy relic before the Great Journey can continue. The humans must not be allowed to enter the artifact; we will do whatever we must to deny them access. All must be resolute in this task, or face punishment.

Event.Name: BlackBox01
Event.Title: 4 February 2531
Event.DetailText: The UNSC support ship Spirit of Fire enters orbit around Harvest. While Admiral Cole's fleet is engaged elsewhere, Spirit is sent to Harvest to investigate ongoing Covenant activity in the system and look for survivors from the missing UNSC Destroyer The Prophecy (previously dispatched to Harvest to investigate the same activity). Commanded by Captain Cutter, Spirit has been reassigned by FLEETCOM. ONI has placed Professor Anders onboard to lead the investigation.

Event.Name: BlackBox09
Event.Title: 6 February 2531
Event.DetailText: Professor Anders writes her father what appears to be a detailed analysis of Homer's Odyssey. In fact it is a coded message detailing her mission to Harvest and the result of the find there. ONI censors miss the cipher completely and the message passes unaltered to her father.

Event.Name: BlackBox02
Event.Title: 7 February 2531
Event.DetailText: Spirit of Fire holds service for the crew of the Prophecy. The crew roster is read despite objections from ONI personnel. The Prophecy was lost with all hands on a first expedition to Harvest to investigate the Covenant interest in the artifact found near the polar region.

Event.Name: BlackBox07
Event.Title: 9 February 2531
Event.DetailText: After engaging Covenant forces on the surface of Harvest, the UNSC vessel Spirit of Fire arrives at Arcadia - only to find that the Covenant are already there and attacking the colony. Spirit's ground forces assist in the evacuation, and help fight the Covenant to a standstill on the surface of the planet.

Event.Name: BlackBox06
Event.Title: From the Office of the High Prophet of Regret
Event.DetailText: Arbiter, you are the Hand of the Covenant - my hand. You know what must be done. Return to the surface and capture the human female - the one who managed to make fools of us on Harvest. She is the key to unlocking the secrets of the Ancients.

Event.Name: BlackBox08
Event.Title: 10 February 2531
Event.DetailText: The capture of Professor Anders forces Captain Cutter's hand; Spirit of Fire pursues the enemy into Covenant space. The ship's AI projects an arrival at their destination in 312 hours. The ship remains on high alert for the duration, though nonessential crewmembers are briefly placed in cryo sleep.

Event.Name: Forge02
Event.Title: 11 February 2531
Event.DetailText: Sergeant Forge confronts SPARTAN Douglas-042 over his recommendation to destroy the Covenant ship carrying Professor Anders. The altercation results in a broken chair, a seal malfunction on a bulkhead door and a stern interruption by the ship's AI, Serina. 42 and Forge always eat together in the mess hall following this event.

Event.Name: BlackBox10
Event.Title: 14 February 2531
Event.DetailText: Serina, knowing that the crew may be on a one way trip, manufactures and delivers fake emails from family members to the crew celebrating Valentine's Day. She uses previous correspondence as a basis for the letters. No one ever suspects her of this deception.

Event.Name: BlackBox12
Event.Title: Excerpt from The Punished Deeds, Vol. III
Event.DetailText: The shield world that Regret intended to activate was one of just a few that the Covenant had uncovered in the quest for the Halos. These treasure chests of technology enabled the Covenant to quickly gain access to advanced weaponry and space propulsion systems allowing them to dominate the galaxy.

Event.Name: BlackBox13
Event.Title: 23 February 2531
Event.DetailText: Spirit of Fire arrives at an uncharted planet swarming with strange alien lifeforms. Within a day, the ship is drawn into the planet's interior, where the crew confronts the Covenant and eventually rescues Professor Anders.

Event.Name: Exile01
Event.Title: Cutter's Log, 25 February 2531
Event.DetailText: Pelicans engaged in ground operations on the outside of the shell planet failed invariably within four to five flights. The dust adhered to the intakes during entry into the planetary atmosphere in an almost defensive manner, as if the planet itself did not want any space vehicles descending down to its surface.

Event.Name: BlackBox15
Event.Title: 25 February 2531
Event.DetailText: Thanks to Sergeant Forge's sacrifice, Spirit of Fire escapes from the Forerunner shield world. Spirit of Fire sets a course for home as the majority of the crew prepare to enter cryo sleep for a journey that will take years, if not decades.

Event.Name: Release01
Event.Title: Chief Medical Officer O'Neil's Log, 26 February 2531
Event.DetailText: The decision to burn bodies infected with the virus was not taken lightly, but the danger to the crew, and the sheer voracity of the infection made taking the bodies aboard Spirit of Fire impossible. Study of the virus and its effects also seems unwise given that we are not equipped with any quarantine labs or have the faintest idea how the virus spreads.

Event.Name: BlackBox14
Event.Title: 1 March 2531
Event.DetailText: Chief Engineer Prescott finishes his assessment of damage to Spirit of Fire and repairs continue to the hull. The FTL core reactor cannot be replaced and plans to manufacture a spare from base reactor units is considered impossible. The decision is made to run the ship on a skeleton crew and place the rest in suspended animation.

Event.Name: Anders02
Event.Title: Cutter's Log, 3 March 2531
Event.DetailText: Professor Anders' captivity by the Covenant has made her the longest known POW in the war so far. She has not sought counseling or talked much about her time in captivity but one can only begin to guess at the nightmares she went through during that terrible time.

Event.Name: Labyrinth01
Event.Title: Anders' Log, 4 March 2531
Event.DetailText: The artificial construction of this "world" was far beyond the Covenant. Indeed, they seemed to be scavenging this technology for their own use and were unable to operate the machinery, either by design or advancement. The fact my hand was required to unlock the device leads me to believe the original builders of the planet may have had some knowledge about humans.

Event.Name: Cutter02
Event.Title: 12 March 2531
Event.DetailText: Captain Cutter walks the ship, stepping into medbay to check on the crew still recovering from the battle. He assures Nurse Hershey that a way will be found home and that she will get to see her husband again. He returns to his cabin and after writing five more commendation recommendations, fourteen family condolence letters and a note to his wife, sleeps for the first time in two weeks.

Event.Name: Repository01
Event.Title: 10 February 2534
Event.DetailText: The UNSC designates Spirit of Fire as "lost with all hands." The previous designation of "missing" had given hope to family and friends. The reason for the change is classified top secret. A memorial service is held for the crew, but many prominent family members do not attend, holding out hope that their loved ones are still alive.

Event.Name: Event008
Event.Title: 1 June 2536
Event.DetailText: The Siege of the Inner Colonies begins as Covenant forces swarm into human-controlled space. For several years, the war falls into a pattern: humans win isolated battles, typically during ground operations, but at horrible cost. One by one, the colonies fall.

Event.Name: BeasleysPlateau01
Event.Title: 9 September 2549
Event.DetailText: The Second Fall of Arcadia. The Covenant left Arcadia alone after their first attack on the planet in 2531 but the humans mostly abandoned it, leaving the capital city Pirth to nature. Eventually a small rural farming community started Abaskun, a rich farmland area on the continent of Mu. Although mostly lawless, the area provided much needed food supplies to the UNSC until the planet was attacked again by the Covenant in the fall of 2549.

Event.Name: FortDeen01
Event.Title: Edict of the Office of the High Prophet of Truth
Event.DetailText: It is known that there is delay installing Luminaries upon newly constructed vessels of war. On each vessel still lacking a Luminary, one Unggoy worker out of every 64 is to be executed. To preserve discipline between the Sangheili overseers and Unggoy, choice of victim and execution is to be by Kig-Yar death squads. This to continue daily until that vessel's Luminary is installed.

Event.Name: BloodGulch01
Event.Title: 27 August 2552
Event.DetailText: Twenty-five of the twenty-eight surviving SPARTAN-IIs, including SPARTAN-117, are recalled to Reach to be briefed on the Covenant threat and to receive their new orders: board a damaged Covenant vessel, use a "mission specialist" to crack the Covenant computer system, and locate the Covenant homeworld. Once accomplished, a covert team will be dispatched to capture the Covenant leadership and broker a truce by force. Despite recent successes, the human military is being systematically slaughtered, and this may be the only chance for survival.

Event.Name: Event009
Event.Title: 30 August 2552 - 0400 hours
Event.DetailText: Reach, the home of ONI's CASTLE facility and the Spartan-II project, is attacked by an overwhelming Covenant force. The vessel Pillar of Autumn, Captain Keyes commanding, transports Spartans into battle, hoping to seize a Covenant vessel. Though the Covenant are prevented from learning Earth's location, most of the Spartans fall in battle and Reach is lost.

Event.Name: Event010
Event.Title: 30 August 2552 - 0500 hours
Event.DetailText: Pillar of Autumn, commanded by Captain Keyes, flees Reach with Covenant ships in pursuit. The ship is heavily damaged, but manages to drop into slipspace and escape. Pillar of Autumn carries the only Spartan thought to have survived the engagement on Reach.

Event.Name: Crevice01
Event.Title: Edict of the Office of the High Prophet of Truth
Event.DetailText: Hear now all personnel to spend today's second rest period in attentive watchfulness before display monitors. All display monitors to display the humbling and punishment of the Sangheili Supreme Commander of the Fleet of Particular Justice, for failure, cowardice, and lack of faith.

Event.Name: Brute02
Event.Title: Edict of the Office of the High Prophet of Truth
Event.DetailText: In recognition of the virtue of the Jiralhanae, it is ordered that all Sangheili aboard the Fleet of Profound Solitude, The Fleet of Tranquil Composure, and the Fleet of Inner Knowledge to be completely replaced by Jiralhanae. Each removed Sangheili to be assigned other duties. In celebration, all imprisoned or criminal Jiralhanae to be released, rehabilitated, and pardoned.
